role_description: An Ansible role that installs GitDock (a GitLab User Interface) on nearly any system
role_description_full_overview: [GitDock](https://gitlab.com/mvanremmerden/gitdock) is an app that displays all your GitLab activities in one place. Instead of the GitLab typical project- or group-centric approach, it collects all your information from a user-centric perspective.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs GitDock (a GitLab User Interface) on nearly any system.
